title: Login with invalid email
expected: Error message for invalid credentials is displayed

title: Login with incorrect password
expected: Error message for invalid credentials is displayed

title: Account lock after 3 failed login attempts
steps: Repeat incorrect password entry two more times

title: Reset password via Forgot Password link
expected: Password reset email is sent to the registered email

title: Error message for empty email field
expected: Error message for empty email is displayed

title: Error message for empty password field
expected: Error message for empty password is displayed
